meanings.definition: Clean between (the teeth) with dental floss.
meanings.sent1: She flosses her teeth every night before bed.
meanings.sent2: He flosses after brushing to keep his gums healthy.
meanings.sent3: The tooth fairy must love when kids floss, less work for her!
meanings.sent4: Her smile flosses away any worries that come her way.
meanings.sent5: Flossing daily can prevent cavities and gum disease.

meanings.definition: Dance by moving the hips in an erotic manner.
meanings.sent1: At the party, she flosses to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent2: The dancers flossed gracefully, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: He tried to floss but ended up looking more like a penguin.
meanings.sent4: Her hips flossed seductively, drawing all eyes to her.
meanings.sent5: The dance instructor taught them how to floss with style.

meanings.definition: Remove unwanted hair or wool from (a surface) by dragging a twisted thread or wire across it.
meanings.sent1: She flosses her sweater to remove the pet hair.
meanings.sent2: He flosses the carpet to get rid of the loose threads.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves when she flosses the couch, it's like a massage!
meanings.sent4: The gardener flosses the bushes to keep them neat and tidy.
meanings.sent5: Flossing the fabric gently ensures a clean finish without damage.
